item.title: Kim add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Kim add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kim add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Give a man a fire and he's warm for a day, but set fire to him and he's warm for the rest of his life." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Kim add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Classic' - a book which people praise and don't read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Kim add a quote by Edmund Burke
item.description: "The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing." -- Edmund Burke

item.title: Kim add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "You will always be fond of me. I represent to you all the sins you never had the courage to commit." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kim add a quote by George Burns
item.description: "Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city." -- George Burns

item.title: Kim add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "If cats looked like frogs we'd realize what nasty, cruel little bastards they are. Style. That's what people remember." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Kim add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "I hate to advocate drugs, alcohol, violence, or insanity to anyone, but they've always worked for me." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Kim add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it." -- Aristotle

item.title: Kim add a quote by W.C. Fields
item.description: "If at first you don't succeed, try, try again. Then quit. No use being a damn fool about it." -- W.C. Fields

item.title: Kim add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "When his life was ruined, his family killed, his farm destroyed, Job knelt down on the ground and yelled up to the heavens, "Why god? Why me?" and the thundering voice of God answered, There's just something about you that pisses me off." -- Stephen King

item.title: Kim add a quote by Dorothy L. Sayers
item.description: "To subdue one's self to one's own ends might be dangerous, but to subdue one's self to other people's ends was dust and ashes. Yet there were those, still more unhappy, who envied even the ashy saltness of those dead sea apples." -- Dorothy L. Sayers

item.title: Kim add a quote by Bill Bryson
item.description: "Life just wants to be; but it doesn't want to be much." -- Bill Bryson
